Summary: It was a bright white object that looked like two long containers attached in middle by something black.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Charlton
There were no other sightings in Charlton on or around July 8th 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting details i was sitting on the edge of a pool at my mother in laws house playing with my 5 yr old son, raising and lowering him in the water with my legs. when my son said to me " daddy, whats that in the sky?" and pointer right at it, up and beyond my left shoulder. i looked over my shoulder and seen a long white tubular object, but some what oddly boxed, it was hard to make out, and there was what seemed to be a black void in the middle. so i got up out of the pool with my 5 yr old son and had him follow me closer to the edge of the yard to get a better look....i looked for wings, none. i listened for sound, none. it moved fairly fast, but not faster than a jet, more like a plane, but quiet....like it was floating. it seemed to make a slight turn coming from the east to west, and then heading north west. there was no con trail. it wasnt very high, probably 2000 ft. hard to guess, but it was below some clouds passing by. as it proceeded to cross the sky \ horizon it shinned white bright, like clean snow. but the middle was pitch black, with what seemed like highlighted areas...like ribs on a construction tube, going horizontal. my son and i watched it disappear beyond our view. i was excited to see something like this, but it wasnt my first time. and after we got back to the pool i started thinking, my son and always say "look at the plane, look at the helicopter." this time he asked me, "daddy whats that in the sky?"
